title: Version 2.1.0 Release
content:
We're excited to announce the release of Special BOX AI v2.1.0 with major improvements!

  • Enhanced natural language understanding
  • New voice interaction mode (iOS only)
  • Improved file upload processing
  • Bug fixes and performance optimizations

title: DeepSearch Mode Introduction
content:
Introducing DeepSearch mode for more comprehensive responses.

  • Iterative web search capabilities
  • Enhanced reference inclusion
  • Available via DeepSearch button in UI

title: SuperGrok Subscription
content:
SuperGrok subscription plan is now available!

  • Higher usage quotas
  • Priority support
  • Exclusive features coming soon
